formalMetadata.description: A document with text in English where a few words or phrases are used in an unusual or restricted way. There are no inline definitions. A glossary below the text explains the technical terms but there are no links between the terms (as they occur in the text) and the definitions.
formalMetadata.title: Text with glossary (not linked) for words used in unusual or restricted way

purpose.p: This test case is intended to pass because a glossary is provided at the bottom of the page. (The definitions are below the text without links to them from the text itself but that does not cause a failure because each word or phrase has only one meaning within the page.)

expertGuidance.p: Check whether you can identify definitions of all words that are used in a restricted or unusual way.

functionalOutcome.p: The user can find definitions of the technical terms (although only by scrolling down the page).
